properties.areaDesc: Waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR from 10 to 60 nm; Coastal waters from Florence to Cape Blanco OR out 10 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 16 at 2:37PM PST until February 19 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford OR
properties.description:
* WHAT...Seas become wind driven and steep at 8 to 9 ft Monday
afternoon. North winds increase to 20 to 25 kt Monday evening.

* WHERE...Small Craft Advisory conditions will affect areas from
Coos Bay southward beyond 2 NM from shore except closer to shore
near Cape Blanco.

* WHEN...From 1 PM Monday to 10 AM PST Wednesday.

* IMPACTS...Gusty winds and/or steep seas could capsize or
damage smaller vessels.

* View the hazard area in detail at
https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/mfr/HAZARD
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should remain in port and avoid the area of hazardous
conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM MONDAY TO 10 AM PST WEDNESDAY
